title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Structured Problem-Solving for Scientific Decision-Making

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more evaluation criteria based on scientific evidence in given social science problem scenarios.
Learners can perform balanced decision-making through trade-off analysis when selecting alternatives.
Learners can integrate two or more perspectives of diverse stakeholders and present logical justifications during the decision-making process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
